channel.title: HEAVIERWEIGHT
channel.description: The Definitive Resource for Women's Competitive Lifting

item.title: TRAIN: Women's Strength Training Programs & Technique Guides
item.dc:creator: HEAVIERWEIGHT Editorial
item.description: 75 evidence-based articles on strength training for women. Beginner to advanced programs, technique guides, and Olympic weightlifting content.

item.title: COMPETE: Powerlifting Federations, Meet Prep & Athlete Profiles
item.dc:creator: HEAVIERWEIGHT Editorial
item.description: 28+ articles on competitive lifting for women. Federation guides, first meet preparation, weight class strategy, and inspiring athlete profiles.

item.title: SCIENCE: Evidence-Based Training & Female Physiology
item.dc:creator: HEAVIERWEIGHT Editorial
item.description: 34 research-backed articles on women's training science. Menstrual cycle, pregnancy, menopause, and biomechanics for female lifters.

item.title: GEAR: Women's Lifting Equipment Reviews & Buying Guides
item.dc:creator: HEAVIERWEIGHT Editorial
item.description: 40 equipment reviews for female lifters. Belts, shoes, barbells, knee sleeves, and home gym guides with women's sizing and fit focus.

item.title: FUEL: Nutrition & Recovery for Female Lifters
item.dc:creator: HEAVIERWEIGHT Editorial
item.description: 24 articles on nutrition for women who lift. Protein needs, RED-S awareness, supplements, and recovery strategies for strength athletes.

item.title: LIFE: Mindset, Community & Wellness for Women Lifters
item.dc:creator: HEAVIERWEIGHT Editorial
item.description: 24 articles on lifting lifestyle. Body image, gym confidence, health conditions, and community building for women who lift.
